item.title: Looking for a hoster (dont know if this is in the right section)
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

This topic breaks rule #1.

1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related question will be locked. Requesting a hoster, coder, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related.

There is no section for requesting hosters.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a hoster (dont know if this is in the right section)
